date: Sun Jan 23 2022 02:37:25 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
keywords: Alex de Minaur,de Minaur,andujar,pablo andújar,pablo andujar
description: Alex de Minaur has reached the fourth round of the Australian Open for the first time in his career. The 22-year-old defeated Pablo Andujar in straight sets in just over two hours. The Australian is the last Australian in the men's draw after Chris O'Connell's defeat to American Maxime Cressy earlier on Saturday. He will face 11th-seeded Italian Jannik Sinner in the last 16.
metaDescription: Alex de Minaur has reached the fourth round of the Australian Open for the first time in his career. The 22-year-old defeated Pablo Andujar in straight sets in just over two hours. The Australian is the last Australian in the men's draw after Chris O'Connell's defeat to American Maxime Cressy earlier on Saturday. He will face 11th-seeded Italian Jannik Sinner in the last 16.
